stories.fantasy_headline: Sky-Wizards Find Strange Stone Realm in Distant Star Cluster
stories.fantasy_story: The Star-Wizards of the Celestial Spire have made a wondrous discovery. Far beyond the known realms, around a dim crimson star, they found a stone realm where only misty giants were expected. This challenges the ancient scrolls, suggesting that the gods craft worlds in stranger ways than once believed.

stories.fantasy_headline: Djinn Guild Unveils New Enchanted Cleaning Golem, But Can It Be Trusted?
stories.fantasy_story: The skilled artificers of the Djinn Guild have presented their latest creation: a self-moving cleaning golem known as the Romo P. This whirring servant is meant to keep manor floors spotless without a maid. However, some question if this magical artifact truly fulfills its promises.
